item.title: Trump VP contender Kristi Noem responds to backlash over story about killing her dog
item.description: The Republican South Dakota governor details what she says was a tough decision to shoot an "untrainable" family dog in a forthcoming memoir. Animal rights advocates and Democrats decried the move.

item.title: Bernie Sanders says Netanyahu is attacking campus protests to deflect war criticism
item.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu criticized ongoing campus protests across the U.S. as antisemitic. The Vermont senator said it was an attempt to "deflect attention" from Israel's actions.

item.title: Hamas releases video of a second American being held hostage in Gaza
item.description: Hamas has released a video showing two captives, one of them an American, as part of an effort to prove that the two men are still alive. It was the second video of a U.S. citizen released this week.

item.title: A 100-degree heat wave in Gaza offers a sweltering glimpse of a tough summer to come
item.description: The heat bore down on Palestinians living in tents and aid groups working in the sun. UNRWA reported several heat injuries among its staff, and at least one 18-year-old Palestinian died from the heat.

item.title: Both sides prepare as Florida's six-week abortion ban is set to take effect Wednesday
item.description: The state currently bans most abortions after 15 weeks of pregnancy. That will drop to six weeks, with a few exceptions — a timetable that abortion rights advocates say is hard to meet

item.title: An Afghan migrant, age 17, drowned in a Bosnian river. Here's how citizens responded
item.description: On the risky journey from the Global South to Europe, migrants often perish. In a town in Bosnia-Herzegovina, near a river where dozens have drowned, citizens seek to provide closure to the families.

item.title: Got brothers or sisters? Warm sibling bonds help boost happiness as you age
item.description: Researchers have found that a warm, close bond with a sibling in early adult life is predictive of good emotional health later in life, with less loneliness, anxiety and depression.

item.title: What abortion politics has to do with new rights for pregnant workers
item.description: A new regulation to protect the rights of pregnant workers is the subject of an anti-abortion lawsuit because it includes abortion as a pregnancy "related medical condition."
